title: Max Horkheimer - Selected Works (3 books)
description:
Three major works by Max Horkheimer (1895-1973), the German philosopher and sociologist famous for his work in critical theory as a member of the "Frankfurt School" of social research.

All of the following books are in PDF format:

* Critical Theory: Selected Essays (Continuum, 1972).  Translated by Matthew J. O'Connell & others.

* Dialectic of Enlightenment: Philosophical Fragments [with Theodor Adorno] (Stanford University Press, 2002).  Edited by Gunzelin Schmid Noerr and translated by Edmund Jephcott.

* Eclipse of Reason (Continuum, 1974)
